TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit QueuePathEditor extends System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor

Docs.summary: Provides a user interface for selecting a message queue path.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: public override object EditValue (System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext context, IServiceProvider provider, object value);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance object EditValue(class System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext context, class System.IServiceProvider provider, object value) cil managed

Docs.param: A that provides additional context information.
A <xref:System.IServiceProvider> that the editor can use to obtain services.
Docs.summary: Edits the value of the specified message queue using the specified type descriptor context and service provider.
Docs.returns: The new value of the message queue path.

remarks.format: ## Remarks If `value` is not a <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue> or a string that specifies a message queue path, this method returns `value`. Otherwise, this method returns the new message queue path.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance valuetype System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditorEditStyle GetEditStyle(class System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext context) cil managed

Docs.param: A that provides additional context information.
Docs.summary: Returns the editing style used by the <xref:System.Messaging.Design.QueuePathEditor.EditValue%2A> method.
